root.name: Out There Somewhere
root.description: OverviewThe story revolves around an astronaut named Yuri, who has crash landed after an attack. Yuri navigates through various puzzles using only his teleport gun to help him escape the vast "Great Mother Planet".Out There Somewhere was released DRM free on February 21st, 2012 on PC through the official Studio MiniBoss website. It is currently part of the Steam Greenlight project awaiting submission. A version for PlayStation Mobile is also in development, which will feature additional content.GameplayOut There Somewhere is a traditional 2D platformer with an emphasis on aiming projectiles that allow the player to advance. The game screen is navigated using a traditional frame to frame perspective. The player must advance either Up, Down, Left or Right to reach a specific objective. Many puzzles include the use of physics, inertia or reflecting shots from Yuri's teleport gun on various surfaces.
